 # Download the [http://avalanche.googlecode.com/files/avalanche-1.0.tar.gz source archive] or checkout it from the repository:
{{{
$ svn checkout http://avalanche.googlecode.com/svn/trunk avalanche
}}}
 # Configure and make (default install directory is /usr/local):
{{{
./configure --prefix=<path to avalanche install directory>
make
}}}
 # Set the program stack size to be "unlimited" before you run Avalanche - STP needs large stack and will most likely fail with stack overflow on any non-trivial example with system's default stack size:
{{{
$ ulimit -s unlimited
}}}
